name: TetrisCrush
description:
Boothcamp project from Googles Game and Application Academy | July 2022

Google Game and Application Academy provided an extensive education program to cultivate digital entrepreneurs in-game and application development and it finalized with a booth camp where teams gathered their knowledge and developed games or applications. I was in the developer role for this booth camp.  It is designed and modeled by other team mates. Wearing the coders hat in the production phase taught me a lot as a game designer.
